entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley's hand had switched to travelling. 'He's coming!' And sure enough, a moment later there was a knock on the back door.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley jumped up and hurried to it; with one hand on the doorknob and her face pressed against the wood she called softly , ‘Arthur, is that you?’

entities.name: arthur
entities.description: ‘Yes,’ came Mr Weasley’s weary voice. ‘But I would say that even if I were a Death Eater, dear. Ask the question!’

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: ‘But I would say that even if I were a Death Eater, dear. Ask the question!’

entities.name: aeroplanes
entities.description: ‘To find out how aeroplanes stay up.’

relationships.description: Mr Weasley’s hand had switched to travelling. ‘He’s coming!’ And sure enough, a moment later there was a knock on the back door.
Mrs Weasley nodded and turned the doorknob, but appar-ently Mr Weasley was holding tight to it on the other side,
‘Molly! I’ve got to ask you your question first!’
